verses.name: Matthew 4:18
verses.text: And Jesus, walking by the sea of Galilee, saw two brethren, Simon called Peter, and Andrew his brother, casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers.

verses.name: Matthew 4:19
verses.text: And he saith unto them, Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.

verses.name: Matthew 4:20
verses.text: And they straightway left their nets, and followed him.

verses.name: Matthew 4:21
verses.text: And going on from thence, he saw other two brethren, James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother, in a ship with Zebedee their father, mending their nets; and he called them.

verses.name: Matthew 4:22
verses.text: And they immediately left the ship and their father, and followed him.
